channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Massey brings a historic lens to the stage with a performance that examines early bicultural relationships. It is challengeing and expressive in form and delivery. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Horomona Horo shares his m?tauranga and insights into his experiences within te ao taonga puoro. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew visits an Anishinaabe bush-man seeking to ?re-teach? his people the traditional ways of living off the land, visits Metis bush-meat gourmet in Manitoba, and goes late-night spear-fishing for salmon on a Cape Breton river.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: NEW: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. Pio discovers a modern, innovative and stylish modular housing approach to kainga whenua development. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Something For The People
channel.desc: A weekly Live Breakfast and late-night M?ori satire show, that combines Whakaata M?ori Te Ao News, Arataua's Haka Yarns, and Code (for the old people) all into one. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.title: The Hui

channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.title: Vaa Voyagers Conquering The Hawaiki Nui
channel.desc: With Hawaiki Nui Va'a race fast approaching, the team are in Te Tii, but injuries plague the team, and they soon realise just getting to the start line is one of their biggest challenges. (R).

channel.title: Te Ahikaaroa

channel.title: Not Even

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Queer and Here
channel.desc: Aniwa introduces his wh?nau, hangs out with icons house mother, Jaycee, and Lea Pao, Queen of Tonga, then heads to Wellington to meet gay couple R?w? and Frankie who are trying to have a baby. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: End Of The Valley

channel.title: Ahik?roa

channel.title: Green
channel.desc: An estranged father and daughter, both with life altering illnesses, smoke marijuana together for the first time and it becomes healing in more ways than one. (R).

channel.title: Song for Serbia
channel.desc: Two sisters decide to escape lockdown and are picked up by a couple of unlikely locals. The couple reveal their true intentions, which is not at all what the sisters expected. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.desc: A thrilling drama from Margaret Mahy. The island of Kaitangata is twitching, it's waking up! Only 13 year old Meredith can stop it. Can she discover what it wants before it is too late? (R).
